page.title: 15SWANDYKE FARM 2
page.content: Mr.Tillson has 1 potato setter, 1 potato harvester,1 brussel machine,1 electric harvester for the late potatoes,6 tractors and a few old tractors as well. He is hoping to get his own electricity from a generator he is building.In the winter he grows daffodils,brussel sprouts,onions and potatoes.Mr.Tillson uses slug pellets on brussels and potatoes.He employs 5 people to work for him.Mr.Tillson uses nitrogen fertilizer.Helicopters spray the potatoes every 3 weeks against blight.Mr.Tillson sends some of his products to London,Brighton and Bournemouth.He uses 50 gallons of diesel a week.The profit depends on the crops,the weather and the demand.
